plot outline: Unable to stand up against his family, Santhosh gets married to Janani but his heart still belongs to his old lover. Unaware of where her husband's love lies, new bride Janani believes she's found eternal happiness. But what happens when destiny brings her face to face with the reality of her marriage? Will Janani and Santhosh walk away, leaving this marriage in shambles?
title: Thirumanam
